title: Author content using OO Workflow Designer
content:
Authoring is the process of creating and editing content.

In OO Workflow Designer, you can author:

  • Operations
  • Flows
  • System properties
OpenText encourages the customer to put only non-sensitive/private information in the relevant fields, which is not provided by OpenText. By not implementing the suggestion you may be exposing the system to increased security risks. You understand and agree to assume all associated risks and hold OpenText harmless for the same. It remains at all times the Customer’s sole responsibility to assess its own regulatory and business requirements. OpenText does not represent or warrant that its products comply with any specific legal or regulatory standards applicable to Customer in conducting Customer's business.
